text: Yusuf Barnabas Bala (born in 1956 -11 July 2021) was a Nigerian politician, an architect, academic and former deputy governor of Kaduna State, Nigeria. He died of a sudden illness on 11 July 2021 with no portfolio in government. == References == Category:Politicians from Kaduna State Category:1956 births Category:2021 deaths
title: Yusuf Barnabas Bala
